Title: The Search
Language: English, German, French, Polish, Hungarian, Czech
Cast: Montgomery Clift, Aline MacMahon, Wendell Corey, Jarmila Novotna, Mary Patton, Ewart G. Morrison, William Rogers, Ivan Jandl, Leopold Borkowski, Claude Gambier
Plot: In the Post-War Berlin, an American private helps a lost Czech boy to find his mother. A silent nine-year-old Czech boy, a survivor of Auschwitz, flees a refugee center in postwar Germany and is found by an American G.I. At the same time, the boy's mother, the sole surviving member of his family, searches refugee centers for her son. Time, distance, and the massive numbers of refugee children are factors hampering the reunion of mother and son. Written by Martin H. Booda <booda@datasync.com>
Keywords: germany, children, concentration camp, auschwitz, u.s. soldier
